The Assignment Technical Focus â€¢ Use Aperture Priority mode for controlling depth of field while allowing the camera to adjust shutter speed. â€¢ Utilize Shutter Priority mode to freeze motion and let the camera manage aperture settings. â€¢ Check your histogram frequently to avoid clipping highlights or shadows. â€¢ Experiment with different metering modes to see how they affect exposure. â€¢ Bracket your shots when light is tricky to ensure you capture the desired exposure. Creative Focus â€¢ Explore shallow depth of field to isolate your subject from the background using a wide aperture. â€¢ Capture motion blur by using a slower shutter speed while maintaining a fixed ISO. â€¢ Use different angles and perspectives to enhance the effect of depth of field. â€¢ Incorporate foreground elements to add depth and interest to your compositions. â€¢ Experiment with backlighting to create dramatic silhouettes and contrast.
